author: National Geographic
description:
From Puerto Rico to the rocky coasts of Wales, you can find bioluminescent tides worldwide. Travel journalist Stephanie Vermillion takes us to Phuket, Thailand, for a one-of-a-kind experience—part light show, part cave tour—to spot this phenomenon. But Thailand isn’t the only place to see them. Here’s where you can find glowing waters too: https://on.natgeo.com/46tsGsE
